results.content: I found this course interesting. Nice example to illustrate the use of PHP and JavaScript. Flat for me, the trainer speaks very slowly, I had to put my video playback speed to 1.5 but in any case it's a good course.
results.content_html: I found this course interesting. Nice example to illustrate the use of PHP and JavaScript. Flat for me, the trainer speaks very slowly, I had to put my video playback speed to 1.5 but in any case it's a good course.

results.content:
I learnt alot from this course. all the concepts used to create the messenger app where already explained from the beginning. so walking through the messenger app was like a big review to wrap-up all the previous topics covered in the course. 
The instructor took a lot of time to explain the concepts, so I will gladly recommend these course to anybody who wants to have a strong understanding of php, pdo, oop, ajax, flexbox, css and actually see everything been used to make a beautiful app.

results.content: So far taking the course, I feel very comfortable to rate this course quite high, the instructor takes his time to explain the reasons behind each and every functionality he applied to different lines of codes. I've been working with css for some time but the content of css used in this course will definitely take one to at least an intermediate css user. I absolutely recommend this course to anyone who wishes to learn the structure of web design and database interaction using php

So far so good.
